mapper.select: SELECT /* ManagementDeviceMapper.selectDevCdList */ dev_id /* 디바이스ID */ , dev_name AS dev_nm /* 디비이스이름 */ , FALSE AS act_yn /* 활성화여부 */ FROM dev_info /* 디바이스TABLE */ WHERE mbr_seq = #{mbrSeq} AND test_dev_yn = TRUE ORDER BY dev_id ASC

SELECT /* ManagementDeviceMapper.selectCmprDevCdList */ dev.dev_id /* 디바이스ID */ , dev.dev_name AS dev_nm /* 디비이스이름 */ , FALSE AS act_yn /* 활성화여부 */ FROM dev_compare cpr /* 비교디바이스TABLE */ INNER JOIN dev_info dev /* 디바이스TABLE */ ON cpr.compare_dev_id = dev.dev_id WHERE cpr.dev_id = #{devId} AND cpr.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY cpr.compare_order ASC

SELECT /* ManagementDeviceMapper.selectDevObsCdList */ obs.dev_id /* 디바이스ID */ , obs.obs_item_id /* 측정항목ID */ , CONCAT(cdt.dtl_cd_nm, '(', obs.unit_type, ')') AS obs_item_nm /* 측정항목명 */ , FALSE AS act_yn /* 활성화여부 */ FROM dev_obs_info obs /* 디바이스측정TABLE */ INNER JOIN cd_dtl cdt /* 코드상세TABLE */ ON cdt.cd_group_id = 'OBS' AND obs.obs_item_id = cdt.dtl_cd AND cdt.lang_cd = 'KOR' WHERE obs.dev_id = #{devId} AND cdt.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY cdt.indc_odrg ASC
